channel.title: Looking for feedback (Java)
channel.description:
I got new exercices in my computer programming class, I had about 10 'basic' exercices and 4 extra.. Since our teacher doesn't correct the extra's because I'm the only one that actually tries them, I hope anyone here could give me more info about what I could improve..
* hex to long converter - http://codeviewer.org/view/code:3704 * long to hex converter - http://codeviewer.org/view/code:3703 * numbers grid - http://codeviewer.org/view/code:370a * christmas tree - http://codeviewer.org/view/code:3709
Note: we HAD to do everything in the main method, except the 'long to hex converter'.
http://www.kattoor.comuf.com/OOP.html

item.title: Looking for feedback (Java)
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Don’t use Math.pow in “Long to Hex”. It is slow (For integers) and unnecessary. The left-shift/right-shift operators would be better for what you want to do.

Read full topic
